Class StockManagementModel

java.lang.Object
ci553.ministore.clients.staffjavafx.stockmanagement.StockManagementModel
public class StockManagementModel extends Object
Model class for the stock management interface. Handles business logic and updates the view through properties.

      Sets the current quantity for the product.
      Parameters:

    • doCheck

      public void doCheck(String productNum)
      Checks the stock for the given product number. Updates the reply property with the product details or an error message.
      Parameters:
      productNum - The product number to check.

    • doAdd

      public void doAdd(String productNum)
      Adds stock to the given product number. Updates the reply property with the updated product details or an error message.
      Parameters:
      productNum - The product number to add stock to.

    • doCorrectStock

      public void doCorrectStock(String productNum, int newStock)
      Corrects the stock for the given product number. Updates the reply property with the updated product details or an error message.
      Parameters:
      productNum - The product number to correct stock for.
      newStock - The new stock quantity.

    • doNewProduct

      public void doNewProduct(String description, double price, int quantity)
      Creates a new product with the given description, price, and quantity. Updates the reply property with the new product details or an error message.
      Parameters:
      description - The description of the new product.
      price - The price of the new product.
      quantity - The quantity of the new product.

    • updateProductImage

      public void updateProductImage(String productNum, String imagePath)
      Updates the product image for the given product number. Updates the reply property with the result or an error message.
      Parameters:
      productNum - The product number to update the image for.
      imagePath - The path to the new image.

    • doFinish

      public void doFinish()
      Finishes the stock management process. Updates the reply property with a completion message.

    • getStockReader

      public StockReadWriter getStockReader()
      Gets the StockReadWriter instance.
      Returns:
      The StockReadWriter instance.

    • validateProduct

      public boolean validateProduct(String productNum)
      Validates the given product number. Updates the reply property with an error message if the product number is invalid.
      Parameters:
      productNum - The product number to validate.
      Returns:
      True if the product number is valid, false otherwise.

    • doDeleteProduct

      public void doDeleteProduct(String productNum)
      Deletes the product with the given product number. Updates the reply property with the result or an error message.
      Parameters:
      productNum - The product number to delete.
